metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1134 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Moodle 3.x. Students who submitted assignments and exported them to portfolios can download any stored Moodle file by changing the download URL.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
